ticket.title: Arel needs to convert symbols passed to .order() into double quoted strings for PostgreSQL
ticket.original-body:
This works:
Business.order('name')
This fails:
Business.order(:name)
The error is:
ActiveRecord::StatementInvalid: PGError: ERROR: non-integer constant in ORDER BY LINE 1: SELECT "businesses".* FROM "businesses" ORDER BY 'name'
ticket.latest-body:

Business.order('name')
This fails:
Business.order(:name)
The error is:
ActiveRecord::StatementInvalid: PGError: ERROR: non-integer constant in ORDER BY LINE 1: SELECT "businesses".* FROM "businesses" ORDER BY 'name'

version.body: Hey Ray! I tried reproducing this bug. I guess I need more info. Can you provide anything else like a failing test or something? Thanks.
